name: liketool-fb.jpg
copy: The WYSIWYG config page for Meteor's streamlined sharing tool.
I coded both the tool itself, which serves as an implementation for Meteor tracking via common share widgets, and the config page.

name: liketool-google.jpg
copy: Widgets were chosen based on user request and usage statistics.

name: liketool-pinterest.jpg
copy: Pinterest was added due to user requet. Although it has no public API, I was able to reverse-engineer their widget for use in the tool.

name: liketool-twitter.jpg
copy: Common features can be changed via this config page. Other features were implimented and can be changed via JavaScript.

name: liketool-save.jpg
copy: A notification informs the user of a successful save.

name: liketool-doc.jpg
copy: Documentation of the tool was provided for advanced users who do not want to use the config page.
